channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After Bombshell SCOTUS Ruling on Immunity, Trump Moves to Have Manhattan Convictions Tossed
Nader says Judge Merchan is 'last best hope' to save republic from Trump; urges jail time
item.description: Attorneys Ralph Nader and Bruce Fein wrote a letter to Judge Juan Merchan, calling for him to sentence former President Trump to prison.

item.title: Bill Maher Advocates for Biden to Bow Out, Prefers Newsom
item.description: In a recent New York Times opinion piece, comedian Bill Maher suggested that President Joe Biden should step aside in the 2024 presidential race and proposed California Gov. Gavin Newsom as a preferable candidate for the Democratic Party.

item.title: Can't Make This Stuff Up: Hunter Biden Is Suing Fox Over 'Revenge Porn'
Democratic senator 'horrified' by Biden's debate performance, says campaign needs to be 'candid'
item.description: Some Democrats are voicing concerns over President Biden's debate performance, which has been heavily criticized.

item.title: Suffolk Poll: One-Third More Likely to Vote Trump After Debate
item.description: Nearly one-third of voters are more inclined to support former President Donald Trump following the first presidential debate, while most respondents believe Democrats should consider replacing President Joe Biden as their nominee.

item.title: BBC Presenter's Despicable Tweet: 'If I Was Biden I'd Hurry Up and Have Trump Murdered'
Trump moves to overturn Manhattan case after SCOTUS immunity decision
item.description: Former President Trump has moved to overturn his criminal conviction following the U.S. Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity while in office.

item.title: Sen. Mullin to Newsmax: Dems Think Voters Too Dumb to See Truth
item.description: Sen. Markwayne Mullin, R-Okla., told Newsmax on Monday that Democrats have a bigger problem than President Joe Biden's cognitive issues: They think American voters are too dumb to see through their propaganda that things are going along swimmingly.

item.title: An Oddly Orange Joe Biden Responds to Trump Immunity Decision, Raises More Questions About His Fitness
Majority of voters favor Biden dropping out while Trump's base 'appears more solid': poll
item.description: President Biden's core supporters are now favoring him dropping out of the 2024 presidential race, according to a newly-released USA TODAY/Suffolk University poll.

item.title: Matt Whitaker to Newsmax: Dems Daft Over High Court Ruling
item.description: Matthew Whitaker, former acting attorney general in the Trump administration, told Newsmax on Monday that Democrats are spinning on "inflammatory hypotheticals" that would never happen in the wake of the Supreme Court's ruling on presidential immunity.

item.title: How a North Dakota Truck Stop Brought the Federal Reserve and the Administrative State to Heel
Biden slams SCOTUS presidential immunity ruling, ignores questions about dropping out
item.description: Biden delivered remarks on Monday evening after SCOTUS ruled in Trump v. United States that a former president has substantial immunity from prosecution for official acts.

item.title: Trump Seeks to Set Aside N.Y. Criminal Verdict Hours After Supreme Court Immunity Ruling
item.description: Donald Trump's lawyers on Monday asked the New York judge who presided over his criminal trial to set aside his conviction and delay his sentencing, scheduled for next week.
